author: Enrique Fueris
title: Mercado laboral en Baleares | Es la comunidad donde más horas se trabaja desde la salida de la pandemia
text: La reactivación de la industria turística en 2022 supuso la recuperación del mercado laboral de Baleares y, con ello, del conjunto de la economía del Archipiélago. El crecimiento se ha consolidado en 2023 y eso se visibiliza en múltiples variables, una de ellas, las horas de trabajo. Baleares se ha convertido desde la salida de la pandemia en la comunidad autónoma con un mayor número de horas efectivas trabajadas de media por trabajador. Baleares es la comunidad donde más horas se trabaja desde la salida de la pandemia Los sindicatos reclaman controlar las sobrecargas laborales en temporada alta y avanzar hacia la reducción de la jornada También en Noticias [La Seu será un hotel de lujo](/noticias/local/2023/12/28/2076253/28d-seu-sera-hotel-lujo.html) [La familia de los menores agredidos en Inca: «Mi hijo aún llora recordando la paliza y no quiere volver al colegio»](/sucesos/ultimas/2023/12/28/2076063/hijo-aun-llora-recordando-paliza-recibio-quiere-volver-colegio.html) [La Part Forana amanece repleta de inocentadas](/noticias/part-forana/2023/12/28/2076305/inocentadas-2023-asi-amanecen-pueblos-mallorca.html) [El Consell ultima el proyecto viario para unir Son Ferriol y el Coll d’en Rebassa](/noticias/local/2023/12/28/2076117/carreteras-mallorca-consell-ultima-proyecto-viario-para-unir-son-ferriol-coll-rebassa.html) [El superalimento que tiene más potasio que el plátano y reduce el dolor de cabeza](/xaloc/dudas-respuestas/2023/12/27/2073695/platano-superalimento-tiene-mucho-potasio-reduce-dolor-cabeza.html) Sin comentarios De momento no hay comentarios.

author: Express News Service
title: TNSTC staff say officer abusing them, threaten strike if action not taken
text:
COIMBATORE: Conductors of Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) working in Ondipudur branch-1 complain that the branch manager (BM) is forcing them to increase revenue and putting them under stress. The Ondipudur Branch I operates 78 services, including 42 under Vidiyal Payanam (free ride for women) scheme.
A conductor from the branch who did not wish to be named, said the collection has come down due to Vidiyal Payanam and they are being forced to make up for the loss. “On an average, we collect Rs 2, 000-Rs 3, 000 daily in two shifts. The revenue will differ depending on the routes. The branch manager says collection is not enough and abuses us using foul language,” he said.
Another conductor charged that the manager marks employees absent for taking casual leave. He said 60 employees were marked as absent enmasse in the attendance register recently, despite all of them having leave balance. Members of a few unions, including those affiliated to the DMK, staged a protest in front of the depot on Tuesday and Wednesday, seeking the manager’s transfer.
They have threatened to go on strike if action is not taken against the manager within a week. Senior officers of TNSTC Coimbatore region are holding talks with the employees. When contacted, the branch manager Manivannan, said the charges against him were false.
He said a few conductors are working sincerely and generating maximum revenue of Rs 5,500 per day, but many are lethargic. When asked about being absent, several crew members have been going on leave frequently without informing him and it affected the operations.

organizations.name: Conductors of Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation

author: REDACCIÓN FARÁNDULA
title: Hugh Jackman fue detenido por guarda de seguridad en Nueva York | EL UNIVERSAL - Cartagena
text: El actor australiano, Hugh Jackman, capturó los medios de comunicación tras protagonizar mediático incidente en el icónico Rockefeller Center, cuando se encontraba en una excursión navideña. ‘The Post’ informó que Jackman compartió experiencias en redes sociales y recomendó a sus seguidores a visitar el lugar en horas de la mañana para evitar multitudes. Pero, el reconocido interprete de ‘Wolverine’ rompió una de las más importantes reglas tras acercarse más de lo debido al emblemático árbol de Navidad, lo que desencadenó la presencia inmediata del personal de seguridad. [Lea aquí: Las causas detrás de la separación de Hugh Jackman y Deborra-Lee ](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/farandula/las-causas-detras-de-la-separacion-de-hugh-jackman-y-deborra-lee-JX9055795) A pesar de su acción, el actor acató, rápidamente, el llamado de atención y contó que el encargado fue amable y le permitió continuar con su excursión. “Recomiendo encarecidamente levantarse temprano la mañana de Navidad e ir a ver el árbol de Navidad del Rockefeller Center. No hay demasiada gente y puedes acercarte bastante. Es posible que haya ido demasiado lejos porque un guardia de seguridad vino a detenerme. Pero fue amable y me dejó ir con solo una advertencia”, escribió el actor en su publicación. [Lea aquí: Hugh Jackman alerta sobre el cáncer de piel en sus redes sociales](https://www.eluniversal.com.co/farandula/hugh-jackman-alerta-sobre-el-cancer-de-piel-en-sus-redes-sociales-JF8117856) Hugh Jackman se encuentra en proceso de separación con su esposa Deborra-lee Furness. La pareja anunció su divorcio en septiembre, a través de un comunicado donde expresaron su gratitud y amor mutuo durante los años que estuvieron juntos y lo importante que es la familia para ellos.

author: Jason Easley
title: Biden’s Press Conference Was A Total Home Run
text: Last updated on July 12th, 2024 at 10:14 pm If President Biden would have delivered his press conference performance at the debate, none of the Democratic panic would have happened. Biden hammered Trump for his tax increase of $2,500 on every family, “Meanwhile, Trump’s calling for a 10% tariff on everything Americans buy, including food from overseas vegetables and other necessities. And economists tell us that that would cost the average American working family another $2500 a year. It’s a tax of $2500.” Video: Biden comes out sharp against Trump at press conference, "Trump's calling for a 10% tariff on everything Americans buy including food from overseas, vegetables, and other necessities. And economists tell us that would cost the average working family another $2,500 a year." [pic.twitter.com/4mTPuatVju] — Sarah Reese Jones (@PoliticusSarah) [July 11, 2024] Biden explained why he is staying in the race: Biden explains why he is not stepping aside, "There's a long way to go in this campaign. And so I'm just going to keep moving. Keep moving, and because look, I got more work to do. We have more work to finish." [pic.twitter.com/wAmi80y6Gv] — Sarah Reese Jones (@PoliticusSarah) [July 11, 2024] Biden hammered Trump for doing nothing while the President was campaigning: Biden blasts Trump for doing nothing while he campaigns, "If you looked at my schedule since I made that stupid mistake in the debate. My schedule has been full bore. I have done — where has Trump been? Riding around in his golf cart." [pic.twitter.com/GOWStvqpzB] — Sarah Reese Jones (@PoliticusSarah) [July 11, 2024] I counted one verbal slip up on the first question when Biden was asked about Harris being qualified to be president and potentially beat Trump and he confused VP Harris and Trump, but otherwise, the President has been flawless in clearly answering and responding to questions. He even referred to the debate as a “stupid mistake.” The Joe Biden that took questions from the press definitely should not leave the race. Joe Biden looked, sounded, and acted like a person who was more than capable of handling the presidency. There was no basis for the Democratic hysteria after the debate, and Biden’s press conference performance showed exactly why he needs to stay in this race. The Joe Biden at this press conference can definitely beat Donald Trump. [see all](https://www.politicususa.com/author/jason-easley)) - [Trump Campaign Demands Equal Time After Biden Oval Office Address](https://www.politicususa.com/2024/07/25/trump-campaign-demands-equal-time-after-biden-oval-office-address.html)- Thu, Jul 25th, 2024 - [Kamala Harris Has Taken The Lead Over Trump In Registered Voters Tracking Poll](https://www.politicususa.com/2024/07/25/kamala-harris-tracking-poll.html)- Thu, Jul 25th, 2024 - [Trump Goes On Fox News To Tell His Supporters Not To Vote](https://www.politicususa.com/2024/07/25/trump-goes-on-fox-news-to-tell-his-supporters-not-to-vote.html)- Thu, Jul 25th, 2024

author: 王佳
title: 仁心育桃李 医术铸师魂④丨菏泽医专张雯：铸就医学教育"暖心引擎" 驱动育人新征程_菏泽新闻_大众网菏泽
text:
初审编辑：刘松
责任编辑：刘进
大众网记者 王奉国 菏泽报道
在菏泽医学专科学校这片充满希望与活力的医学教育园地里，传染病学教研室主任张雯以满腔热忱、高度责任感和使命感，全身心投入教育工作，用实际行动诠释着“为人师表，教书育人”的深刻内涵。
忠于职守 深耕讲台展风采
张雯从踏上教育岗位的第一天起，便坚守在教育第一线。她先后承担《内科学》《诊断学》《临床医学实践技能》《传染病学》等多门专业课程授课任务，并积极投身各类教学比赛与培训活动，在竞争中磨砺自己，斩获诸多佳绩。
教学之余，张雯还踊跃参与课程建设，是国家级在线开放课程《临床医学实践技能》以及山东省成人数字化课程、在线开放课程《传染病学》等建设的主要成员，还参与《传染病学》课程思政资源库建设，并参与多部高职专业规划教材编写，不断提升教育教学水平，践行着“教书育人”的神圣誓言。
言传身教 立德树人引方向
高校是学生人生的重要转折点，教师肩负着塑造学生灵魂的重任。张雯深知，传授理论知识只是教育的一部分，引导学生树立正确的“三观”更为关键。在教学过程中，张雯巧妙地将课程思政、专业认知教育、职业生涯教育、安全教育等育人目标融入专业知识讲授中。
同时，张雯以身作则，以德立身，让学生在耳濡目染中接受教育，学会做人做事，顺利与社会接轨，充分体现了菏泽医专注重学生全面发展和品德培养的教育特色。
仁爱之心 以爱育人暖心灵
教育是一场温暖的修行，育人是一份充满爱的事业。张雯怀着对教育事业的赤诚与仁爱之心，秉持“以爱育人”的教育理念。
在课堂上，张雯尊重每一位学生的性格特点与人格尊严，尊重学生的认知规律。作为专业课老师和学业导师，她发挥医学专业背景优势，耐心帮助学生树立专业信心，精心指导学生做好个人职业规划，成为学生专业学习与人生发展道路上的贴心引路人，让教育充满温度。
践行担当 以责育人显风采
教育的舞台不仅在三尺讲台，更在广阔的社会天地。张雯将对教育的热忱转化为服务社会的实际行动，积极投身公益事业。她多次参与山东省乡村医生培训项目，承担线上教学资源制作和现场授课任务，为提升乡村医疗水平贡献力量。
此外，张雯还踊跃参加校内外的志愿服务活动，开展健康宣教，为学生树立起践行社会责任的榜样，展现了菏泽医专教师服务社会的担当精神。
初审编辑：刘松
责任编辑：刘进

author: ArcaMax Publishing, Inc.
title: Dolphins' Tua throws with injured thumb, but still no Waddle | Football | ArcaMax Publishing
text:
MIAMI GARDENS, Fla. — Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa was throwing passes with the injured thumb on his left hand at the team’s Thursday practice, and he appeared to have no limitations.
Tagovailoa let short, intermediate and deep balls fly without wearing anything on the thumb on his throwing hand.
The Dolphins quarterback was first learned to be dealing with the thumb injury, along with a quadriceps ailment, after both he and coach Mike McDaniel had their Wednesday media sessions, when the team’s first injury report of the week leading up to Sunday’s showdown with the Baltimore Ravens was released.
That left Dolphins offensive coordinator Frank Smith to answer on the quarterback’s injury.
“This time of year, it’s December, and everybody’s working through stuff,” Smith. “As Tua and all the guys work through it, we just make sure we take it one day at a time, focus on Baltimore.”
He deflected questions on his status for Sunday at M&T Bank Stadium, whether he has any limitations on throws from the Ravens game and noted contingencies are always prepared for when asked if backup quarterback Mike White needed to get extra reps. Smith did say he believes Tagovailoa hurt the thumb on a throw against the Dallas Cowboys in last Sunday’s win.
 Tagovailoa appeared fine during the brief media viewing portion of practice, however. As for the quadriceps injury, he was wearing compression on both legs Thursday.
Smith, though, lightened the mood when he said he himself is questionable for the Ravens game with a papercut.
Wide receiver Tyreek Hill (ankle) and left tackle Terron Armstead (ankle/knee/back) were back at the Dolphins’ Thursday practice, but wide receiver Jaylen Waddle (ankle) and running back Raheem Mostert (ankle/knee) were not seen participating.
“We have contingencies we work through to put ourselves in the best position possible,” Smith said of possibly being without Waddle.
